appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store

appDesc.message: Display NGI Eolo 10 quotas and alert the user when they are running out.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store

dailyTraffic.description: Label befor the used and total amount of data used

lastUpdate.description: Last time the information were updated

overQuota.message: You are over your daily traffic quota
overQuota.description: Warning shown when the user is over the daily quota

nearQuota.message: You are about to exceed your daily traffic quota
nearQuota.description: Warning shown when the user is near the daily quota

noVoipCredit.message: You don't have VoIP credit left
noVoipCredit.description: Warning shown when the user has no VoIP credit left

littleVoipCredit.message: You don't have much VoIP credit left
littleVoipCredit.description: Warning shown when the user is near zero VoIP credit left

wrongsData.message: Wrong data received Maybe you're not connected with NGI Eolo 10? Server status: $status$
wrongsData.description: The json was fetched, but it's wrong

connectionError.message: Unable to fetch data. textStatus: $textStatus$; errorThrown: $errorThrown$

optNotifyTraffic.message: Notify when used traffic is above

optNotifyNoTraffic.message: Notify when all the traffic was used
optNotifyNoTraffic.description: Option label for no traffic left

optNotifyLowVoIPCredit.message: Notify when VoIP credit drops below

optNotifyNoVoIPCredit.message: Notify when no VoIP credit is left
optNotifyNoVoIPCredit.description: Option label for no VoIP credit

optBackgroundCheck.description: Option label for background check interval
